bool BWResourceImpl::isValidZipSize ( uint64  size,
const std::string &  path 
) [static]

This static method finds out if a size value is bigger than the maximum Zip file size supported.

Parameters:
size Size value to compare with the maximum supported size.
path Path of the file, used only for error reporting.
Returns:
True if size is less or equal to the maximum supported size, false otherwise.
